title: Proper name as a direct object

body.text: If a direct object consists of a proper name, it is of course a specific direct object.

table: We still remember Anneke and Rogier very well.

body.text: Zich herinneren (to remember) is a reflexive verb.

table: He has already read War and Peace about six times.

body.text: Een keer of zes is the translation of about six times.
